title: Microsoft Messenger 8.0 Beta
description:
-------------INTEL ONLY------------------

This version includes A/V conversations with your contacts that use Windows Live Messenger 2009. (This update will be soon mandatory for every Windows user , so soon you will be able to video/audio chat with all your contacts)

It's very unstable and you may experience some crashes , but it's working ;)
If you download this you have no support, till official public beta is out
(This torrent will be deleted when the official beta is out)

Some important information:

When you first open Microsoft Messenger (Debug) you may see the Assistant with no language , just numbers, to fix this follow these instructions:

-Right Click (or ctrl-click) Microsoft Messenger (Debug) and go to "Get Info" , then there's a "Language" tab, go in there and UNCHECK every language but English. --> Restart the App (If you've already opened it)
-----------This version is not localized , you'll have to wait.-------------
-You may experience some login trouble , to fix this , you can change the server you can connect in the Sign in screen
